code: @Override public void configure() throws Exception {     // you can define the endpoints and predicates here     // it is more common to inline the endpoints and predicates in the route     // as shown in the CreateOrderRoute     Endpoint newOrder = endpoint("activemq:queue:newOrder").     Predicate isWidget = xpath("/order/product = 'widget'").     Endpoint widget = endpoint("activemq:queue:widget").     Endpoint gadget = endpoint("activemq:queue:gadget").     from(newOrder).choice().when(isWidget).to(// add a log so we can see this happening in the shell     "log:widget").to(widget).otherwise().to(// add a log so we can see this happening in the shell     "log:gadget").to(gadget). }
